textBox.richText: Word from Collingwood again. Arrived in Meaford this morning bright and early for game #1. After changing in the closet Meaford had set up for us, Will started getting on my nerves and I decided to show him who’s boss. We had a serious UFC battle royale. It would have been a good fight if Wilload-of-crap hadn’t cheated. I won’t go into the details but I think everyone knows who the real winner was. (editor’s note: Will always wins, he has “The Belt”) So the game was just like Kirsten Dunst - beautiful and nice to look at. Our next game is at 5 so we’re preparing mentally. Serious pingpong minus a net, and munchin on cheerios. I love chez Nash. Who else has a urinal IN their house! That’s when you know you’ve made it. I’m out to go birdwatching around town. Starting at the slopes, then I’ll go from there... peace
